name: Heavy Handed Wasteland
description:
The world has been destroyed... we don't really know how long it's been, but one thing is for certain. You must have a heavy hand to survive this devastated place.

 With your huge fists and grapple hook you must push out opponents who wish to take over your territory, literally as the only way to defeat anyone in this wasteland is throwing them down the pits around the world.

SWING, PUNCH, AND DODGE YOUR WAY TO VICTORY

Project Created by Aidan O'Donnell, Gabriel Engelmann, and Justin
